title: Remove stats text and change homepage background to cream

requirements.text: Remove the '500 happy buyers' and '60% savings' statistics/text elements from the homepage (HomePage.tsx). These stat badges or counters should be completely removed from the DOM, leaving no placeholder or empty space where they appeared.

quotes: take off the 500 happy buyers and. 60% savings.

acceptanceCriteria: The text '500 happy buyers' does not appear anywhere on the homepage
The text '60% savings' does not appear anywhere on the homepage
No empty container or blank space remains where these stats previously appeared
All other homepage sections remain intact and unchanged

requirements.text: Change the homepage background color from white to cream (approximately #FFFDF7 or a warm off-white cream tone) in HomePage.tsx. Apply this to the main page background and any sections that currently use a white (#FFFFFF) background so the overall page feels warm and creamy rather than stark white. All dark brown button styling (#3B1F0E) must remain unchanged.

quotes: Make the background color cream instead of white

acceptanceCriteria: The homepage main background color is cream (warm off-white, e.g., #FFFDF7 or equivalent) instead of pure white
Sections previously using a white background now use the cream color
Text remains legible against the cream background with adequate contrast
All dark brown buttons (#3B1F0E) remain unchanged in color
No other pages or components are affected by this background color change

constraints: All dark brown button styling (#3B1F0E) must remain unchanged
The hero image (hero-banner-prom.dim_1200x800.jpg) must remain unchanged
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing background colors on pages other than the homepage
Altering any button styles or colors
Changing the visual theme beyond the homepage background color
